text: Jalan Kompleks CIQ Bukit Bunga, Federal Route 480 is an institutional facilities federal road in Kelantan, Malaysia. It is a main route to Bukit Bunga Checkpoint and Ban Buketa, Thailand. At most sections, the Federal Route 480 was built under the JKR R5 road standard, allowing maximum speed limit of up to 90 km/h. == List of junctions and towns == {|class="wikitable" |- !Km||Exit||Junctions||To||Remarks |- | || ||Bukit Nangka||East Tanah Merah Machang Kota Bharu Kuala Terengganu South Gerik Jeli||T-junctions |- | || ||Bukit Bunga||Northwest Nangka Anti Smuggling Unit (UPP) Base South Bukit Bunga Tanah Merah Kota Bharu ||T-junctions |- | || ||Bukit Bunga Checkpoint|| || |- | colspan="6" style="width:600px; text-align:center; background:red;"|Anti- Smuggling Unit (UPP) checkpoint |- | colspan="6" style="width:600px; text- align:center; background:blue;"|Bukit Bunga Checkpoint |- | || ||Bukit Bunga Checkpoint|| || |- | || ||Bukit Bunga-Ban Buketa Bridge Kolok River|| ||Start/End of bridge |- | colspan="6" style="width:600px; text- align:center; background:blue;"|Malaysia Kelantan Darul Naim Tanah Merah district border (Time Zone: UTC+08:00 (Malaysia Standard Time)) |- | colspan="6" style="width:600px; text-align:center; background:yellow;"| Bukit Bunga-Ban Buketa Bridge Kolok River |- | colspan="6" style="width:600px; text-align:center; background:blue;"|ประเทศไทย Thailand จังหวัดนราธิวาส Narathiwat Province (Time Zone: UTC+07:00 (Thailand Standard Time)) |- | || ||Bukit Bunga-Ban Buketa Bridge Kolok River|| ||Start/End of bridge |- | || || ||North ประเทศไทย Thailand Ban Buketa Checkpoint 4057 บูเก๊ะตา Ban Buketa|| |} ==References== Category:Malaysian Federal Roads
title: Jalan Kompleks CIQ Bukit Bunga
